forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High of 77F. Winds from the West at 5 to 10 mph shifting to the South in the afternoon.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High of 25C. Winds from the West at 5 to 15 km/h shifting to the South in the afternoon.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with a chance of rain. Low of 66F. Winds from the South at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with a chance of rain. Low of 19C. Winds from the South at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60% with rainfall amounts near 1.0 mm possible.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with thunderstorms and rain showers. High of 77F. Windy. Winds from the SSE at 15 to 20 mph with gusts to 35 mph. Chance of rain 80% with rainfall amounts near 0.2 in. possible.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with thunderstorms and rain showers. High of 25C. Windy. Winds from the SSE at 20 to 30 km/h with gusts to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 80% with rainfall amounts near 6.3 mm possible.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with thunderstorms and rain showers. Low of 61F. Windy. Winds from the SSW at 15 to 20 mph with gusts to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100% with rainfall amounts near 1.5 in. possible.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with thunderstorms and rain showers. Low of 16C. Windy. Winds from the SSW at 25 to 35 km/h with gusts to 60 km/h. Chance of rain 100% with rainfall amounts near 36.8 mm possible.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with thunderstorms and a chance of rain in the morning, then partly cloudy. High of 73F. Winds from the West at 5 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with thunderstorms and a chance of rain in the morning, then partly cloudy. High of 23C. Windy. Winds from the West at 10 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening, then mostly cloudy. Low of 55F. Winds from the NNE at 10 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low of 13C. Breezy. Winds from the NNE at 15 to 20 km/h.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High of 72F. Winds from the NE at 5 to 10 mph shifting to the ESE in the afternoon.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High of 22C. Winds from the NE at 5 to 15 km/h shifting to the ESE in the afternoon.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Clear in the evening, then partly cloudy. Low of 59F. Winds less than 5 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear in the evening, then partly cloudy. Low of 15C. Winds less than 5 km/h.
